name: Brainful
description:
** From the creators of the App Store featured Super Flip Game and Color Magnet! **

Brainful is another magnific brain trainer, a game that truly stimulates your brain to the maximum and tests your reflexes and memory! It promises to make you nervous, anxious, desperate, crazy... just wanting to play more & more!

The goal is simple: the buttons on the cascading display will tell you the next column you must tap. Always remember the symbol you’ve just selected and try to score as much as you can. Focus, follow the logic and don’t get distracted!

Score higher and higher and put your brain to the test in this insane, addicting, challenging and colorful brain teaser!


• 2 CHALLENGING GAME MODES
- Stepper mode: a progressive introduction to the game mechanics with 18 levels to complete.
- Endless mode: work your brain to its fullest while you strive to beat your highscore.

• 7 BEAUTIFUL COLOR THEMES
Enjoy an endless and amazing colorful experience with the 7 fantastic color combinations, specifically selected to make your screens look very, very nice!

• RELAXING MUSIC & COOL TONES
Have fun playing while listening to a relaxing music or turn it off to discover cool tones in Endless mode.

• LEADERBOARDS
Beat everybody’s highscore in Endless mode and challenge your friends. Give them real reasons to get brainful headaches!

• ACHIEVEMENTS
Unlock the fun achievements while you improve your performance along the way.


Come play and try to beat our highscore of 385!
